end_datetime.title: End date time
end_datetime.description: Date and time until when this announcement is to be displayed.

label.title: Label
label.description: Short description of this announcement.

start_datetime.title: Start date time
start_datetime.description: Date and time after which this announcement will be displayed.

text.title: Text
text.description: The actual text to be displayed.

internal_name.title: Internal name
internal_name.description: This value will be used when referencing this asset. Can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

documents_url.title: Documents URL
documents_url.description: URL of the API endpoint showing the list documents inside this cabinet.

full_path.title: Full path
full_path.description: The name of this cabinet level appended to the names of its ancestors.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text used to identify the cabinet.

delete_time_period.title: Delete time period
delete_time_period.description: Amount of time after which documents of this type in the trash will be deleted.

document_stub_expiration_interval.title: Document stub expiration interval
document_stub_expiration_interval.description: Time (in seconds) after which a document stub will be considered invalid and deleted, if pruning is enabled. This an optimization setting and should only be changed for specific circumstances.

document_stub_pruning_enabled.title: Document stub pruning
document_stub_pruning_enabled.description: Delete documents that do not contain any files after a configured expiration interval.

filename_generator_backend.title: Filename generator backend
filename_generator_backend.description: The class responsible for producing the actual filename used to store the uploaded documents.

filename_generator_backend_arguments.title: Filename generator backend arguments
filename_generator_backend_arguments.description: The arguments for the filename generator backend as a YAML dictionary.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text identifying the document type.

trash_time_period.title: Trash time period
trash_time_period.description: Amount of time after which documents of this type will be moved to the trash.

checksum.title: Checksum
checksum.description: A hash/checkdigit/fingerprint generated from the document's binary data. Only identical documents will have the same checksum.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: An optional short text describing the document file.

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: The document file file encoding. binary 7-bit, binary 8-bit, text, base64, etc.

mimetype.title: MIME type
mimetype.description: The document file's file mimetype. MIME types are a standard way to describe the format of a file, in this case the file format of the document. Some examples: "text/plain" or "image/jpeg".

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The server date and time when the document file was processed.

content_type_id.title: Content type id
content_type_id.description: Content type ID of the source object for the page.

object_id.title: Object id
object_id.description: ID for the source object of the page.

page_number.title: Page number
page_number.description: Unique integer number for the page. Pages are ordered by this number.

active.title: Active
active.description: Determines the active version of the document.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: An optional short text describing the document version.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The server date and time when the document version was created.

datetime_created.title: Created
datetime_created.description: The date and time of the document creation.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional short text describing a document.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text identifying the document. By default, will be set to the filename of the first file uploaded to the document.

language.title: Language
language.description: The primary language in the document.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: UUID of a document, universally Unique ID. An unique identifier generated for each document.

document.title: Document ID
document.description: Primary key of the document to add to the cabinet.

document.title: Document ID
document.description: Primary key of the document to remove from the cabinet.

first_name.title: First name
first_name.description: The given name of the user.

groups_url.title: Groups URL
groups_url.description: URL of the API endpoint showing the list groups this user belongs to.

is_active.title: Is active?
is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.

last_name.title: Last name
last_name.description: The family name of the user.

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

expiration_datetime.title: Check out expiration date and time
expiration_datetime.description: Amount of time to hold the document checked out in minutes.

document_pk.title: Document ID
document_pk.description: Primary key of the document to be checked out.

label.title: Label
label.description: Short description of this credential.

backend_path.title: Backend path
backend_path.description: The dotted Python path to the backend class.

backend_data.title: Backend data
backend_data.description: JSON encoded data for the backend class.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: Enter the arguments for the drive for the specific document type as a YAML dictionary. ie: {"degrees": 180}

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable this driver to process document files of the selected document type.

label.title: Label
label.description: Short description of this metadata type.

lookup.title: Lookup
lookup.description: Enter a template to render. Must result in a comma delimited string.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name used by other apps to reference this metadata type. Do not use python reserved words, or spaces.

parser.title: Parser
parser.description: The parser will reformat the value entered to conform to the expected format.

parser_arguments.title: Parser arguments
parser_arguments.description: Enter the arguments for the parser in YAML format.

validation.title: Validator
validation.description: The validator will reject data entry if the value entered does not conform to the expected format.

validation_arguments.title: Validator arguments
validation_arguments.description: Enter the arguments for the validator in YAML format.

auto_ocr.title: Auto OCR
auto_ocr.description: Automatically queue newly created documents for OCR.

auto_parsing.title: Auto parsing
auto_parsing.description: Automatically queue newly created documents for parsing.

document_id.title: Document ID
document_id.description: Document ID for the new favorite document.

datetime_created.title: Created
datetime_created.description: The date and time of the document creation.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional short text describing a document.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text identifying the document. By default, will be set to the filename of the first file uploaded to the document.

language.title: Language
language.description: The primary language in the document.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: UUID of a document, universally Unique ID. An unique identifier generated for each document.

text.title: Text
text.description: Actual text content of the comment.

datetime_created.title: Created
datetime_created.description: The date and time of the document creation.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional short text describing a document.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text identifying the document. By default, will be set to the filename of the first file uploaded to the document.

language.title: Language
language.description: The primary language in the document.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: UUID of a document, universally Unique ID. An unique identifier generated for each document.

internal_name.title: Internal name
internal_name.description: Normalized name of the file metadata entry.

key.title: Key
key.description: Name of the file metadata entry as provided by the driver.

value.title: Value
value.description: Value of the file metadata entry.

content.title: Content
content.description: The actual text content as extracted by the document parsing backend.

key_id.title: Key ID
key_id.description: ID of the key that will be used to sign the document.

key.title: Key ID
key.description: Primary key of the secret key used to sign the document file.

passphrase.title: Passphrase
passphrase.description: The passphrase to unlock the key and allow it to be used to sign the document file.

key_id.title: Key ID
key_id.description: ID of the key that will be used to sign the document.

key_id.title: Key ID
key_id.description: ID of the key that will be used to sign the document.

key.title: Key ID
key.description: Primary key of the secret key used to sign the document file.

passphrase.title: Passphrase
passphrase.description: The passphrase to unlock the key and allow it to be used to sign the document file.

key.title: Key
key.description: Name of the source metadata entry.

value.title: Value
value.description: The actual value stored in the source metadata for the document file.

value.title: Value
value.description: The actual value stored in the metadata type field for the document.

datetime_created.title: Created
datetime_created.description: The date and time of the document creation.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional short text describing a document.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text identifying the document. By default, will be set to the filename of the first file uploaded to the document.

language.title: Language
language.description: The primary language in the document.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: UUID of a document, universally Unique ID. An unique identifier generated for each document.

internal_name.title: Internal name
internal_name.description: This value will be used when referencing this signature capture in relationship to the document. Can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

text.title: Text
text.description: Print version of the captured signature.

color.title: Color
color.description: The RGB color values for the tag.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text used as the tag name.

tag.title: Tag ID
tag.description: Primary key of the tag to add to the document.

tag.title: Tag ID
tag.description: Primary key of the tag to remove from the document.

document_type_id.title: Document type ID
document_type_id.description: Primary key of the document type into which the document will be changed.

backend_id.title: Backend ID
backend_id.description: Primary key of the modification backend to execute.

content.title: Content
content.description: The actual text content extracted by the OCR backend.

completion.title: Completion
completion.description: The percent of completion that this state represents in relation to the workflow. Use numbers without the percent sign.

final.title: Final
final.description: The state at which the workflow will stop. Only one state can be the final state.

initial.title: Initial
initial.description: The state at which the workflow will start in. Only one state can be the initial state.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text to describe the workflow state.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition that will determine if this transition is enabled or not. The condition is evaluated against the workflow instance. Conditions that do not return any value, that return the Python logical None, or an empty string ('') are considered to be logical false, any other value is considered to be the logical true.

destination_state_id.title: Destination state ID
destination_state_id.description: Primary key of the destination state to be added.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text to describe the transition.

origin_state_id.title: Origin state ID
origin_state_id.description: Primary key of the origin state to be added.

transition_id.title: Transition ID
transition_id.description: Primary key of the transition to be added.

auto_launch.title: Auto launch
auto_launch.description: Launch workflow when document is created.

ignore_completed.title: Ignore completed
ignore_completed.description: Ignore workflow instances if they are in their final state.

internal_name.title: Internal name
internal_name.description: This value will be used by other apps to reference this workflow. Can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text to describe the workflow.

log_entries_url.title: Log entries URL
log_entries_url.description: A link to the entire history of this workflow.

url.title: URL
url.description: API URL pointing to a workflow in relation to the document to which it is attached. This URL is different than the canonical workflow URL.

workflow_template_id.title: Workflow template ID
workflow_template_id.description: Primary key of the workflow template to launch.

users_url.title: Users URL
users_url.description: URL of the API endpoint showing the list users of this group.

user.title: User ID
user.description: Primary key of the user to add to the group.

user.title: User ID
user.description: Primary key of the user to remove from the group.

label.title: Label
label.description: Short description of this index.

document_types_add_url.title: Document types add URL
document_types_add_url.description: URL of the API endpoint to add document types to this index template.

document_types_url.title: Document types URL
document_types_url.description: URL of the API endpoint showing the list document types associated with this index template.

document_types_remove_url.title: Document types remove URL
document_types_remove_url.description: URL of the API endpoint to remove document types from this index template.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Causes this index to be visible and updated when document data changes.

label.title: Label
label.description: Short description of this index.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: This value will be used by other apps to reference this index.

document_type.title: Document type ID
document_type.description: Primary key of the document type to add to the index template.

document_type.title: Document type ID
document_type.description: Primary key of the document type to remove from the index template.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Causes this node to be visible and updated when document data changes.

expression.title: Indexing expression
expression.description: Enter a template to render. Use Django's default templating language.

link_documents.title: Link documents
link_documents.description: Check this option to have this node act as a container for documents and not as a parent for further nodes.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Parent index template node of this node.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Causes this node to be visible and updated when document data changes.

expression.title: Indexing expression
expression.description: Enter a template to render. Use Django's default templating language.

link_documents.title: Link documents
link_documents.description: Check this option to have this node act as a container for documents and not as a parent for further nodes.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Parent index template node of this node.

key_data.title: Key data
key_data.description: ASCII armored version of the key.

backend_data.title: Backend data
backend_data.description: JSON encoded data for the backend class.

backend_path.title: Backend path
backend_path.description: The dotted Python path to the backend class.

default.title: Default
default.description: If default, this mailing profile will be pre-selected on the document mailing form.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text describing the mailing profile.

body.title: Body
body.description: The actual content of the message.

date_time.title: Creation date and time
date_time.description: Date and time of the message creation.

read.title: Read
read.description: This field determines if the message has been read or not.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text describing the role.

permission.title: Permission ID
permission.description: Primary key of the permission to add to the ACL.

permission.title: Permission ID
permission.description: Primary key of the permission to remove from the ACL.

mailing_profile.title: Mailing profile ID
mailing_profile.description: Primary key of the mailing profile to use.

group.title: Group ID
group.description: Primary key of the group to add to the role.

group.title: Group ID
group.description: Primary key of the group to remove from the role.

permission.title: Permission ID
permission.description: Primary key of the permission to add to the role.

permission.title: Permission ID
permission.description: Primary key of the permission to remove from the role.

result_count.title: Result count
result_count.description: Number of results stored in the resultset.

time_to_live.title: Time to live
time_to_live.description: Time to keep the resultset in seconds. This value is increased every time the resultset is accessed.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The server date and time when the resultset was created.

dynamic_label.title: Dynamic label
dynamic_label.description: Use this field to show a unique label depending on the document from which the smart link is being accessed.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text describing the smart link.

expression.title: Expression
expression.description: The expression using document properties to be evaluated against the foreign document field.

foreign_document_data.title: Foreign document attribute
foreign_document_data.description: This represents the metadata of all other documents.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: The inclusion is ignored for the first item.

negated.title: Negated
negated.description: Inverts the logic of the operator.

document_type.title: Document type ID
document_type.description: Primary key of the document type to add to the smart link.

document_type.title: Document type ID
document_type.description: Primary key of the document type to remove from the smart link.

backend_data.title: Backend data
backend_data.description: JSON encoded data for the backend class.

backend_path.title: Backend path
backend_path.description: The dotted Python path to the backend class.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text to describe this source.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: Optional arguments for the action. Must be JSON formatted.

datetime_created.title: Created
datetime_created.description: The date and time of the document creation.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional short text describing a document.

document_type_id.title: Document type ID
document_type_id.description: Document type ID for the new document.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text identifying the document. By default, will be set to the filename of the first file uploaded to the document.

language.title: Language
language.description: The primary language in the document.

trashed_date_time.title: Date and time trashed
trashed_date_time.description: The server date and time when the document was moved to the trash.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: UUID of a document, universally Unique ID. An unique identifier generated for each document.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text describing the web link.

template.title: Template
template.description: Template that will be used to craft the final URL of the web link.

document_type.title: Document type ID
document_type.description: Primary key of the document type to add to the web link.

document_type.title: Document type ID
document_type.description: Primary key of the document type to remove from the web link.

document_type_id.title: Document type ID
document_type_id.description: Primary key of the document type to add to the workflow.

document_type_id.title: Document type ID
document_type_id.description: Primary key of the document type to remove from the workflow.

backend_data.title: Backend data
backend_data.description: JSON encoded data for the backend class.

backend_path.title: Backend path
backend_path.description: The dotted Python path to the backend class.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition that will determine if this state action is executed or not. The condition is evaluated against the workflow instance. Conditions that do not return any value, that return the Python logical None, or an empty string ('') are considered to be logical false, any other value is considered to be the logical true.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short text describing the action. Actions are execute by alphabetical order.

when.title: When
when.description: At which moment of the state this action will execute.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount of the selected escalation units of time.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Comment to save to the workflow instance when the escalation is executed.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition that will determine if this object is executed or not. Conditions that do not return any value, that return the Python logical None, or an empty string ('') are considered to be logical false, any other value is considered to be the logical true.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable automatic transition the workflow after a specified amount of time has elapsed in the state without change.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Determine the order in which the escalations will be evaluated. Escalations with a lower priority number are executed before escalations with a higher priority number.

workflow_template_transition_id.title: Workflow template transition ID
workflow_template_transition_id.description: Primary key of the workflow template transition to be added.

name.title: Internal name
name.description: The name that will be used to identify this field in other parts of the workflow system.

help_text.title: Help text
help_text.description: An optional message that will help users better understand the purpose of the field and data to provide.

label.title: Label
label.description: The field name that will be shown on the user interface.

lookup.title: Lookup
lookup.description: Enter a template to render. Must result in a comma delimited string.

required.title: Required
required.description: Whether this field needs to be filled out or not to proceed.

widget.title: Widget class
widget.description: An optional class to change the default presentation of the field.

widget_kwargs.title: Widget keyword arguments
widget_kwargs.description: A group of keyword arguments to customize the widget. Use YAML format.
